reviews.text: Great food and wine for affordable prices, professional service. In my opinion, a good place to have a cozy dinner or just have a couple drinks and enjoy the atmosphere. And the view is truly stunning. Loved this place!

Service was awful, some of the worst I had. Waiter kept forgetting what we ordered and had to ask us over and over again. We got our starters 1h after ordering. Brought us the wrong bottle of water. Found out 1 hour after ordering they didn't have my main dish anymore, I reordered, then they got confused and got me a different main from the one I had to reorder which of course they said was for free. The problem is I couldn't it eat, so I had to reorder, at that point we were already sitting there for 1h30. Just had the time to eat the mains and got kicked out as the restautant was closing, no chance to get dessert. Worst experience. Too bad because food and scenery was great.
Nice service and atmosphere, well priced beer. Don't expect too much on the food. Tho at least their chefs admit that the seafood are frozen instead of fresh ones.

Extremely  slow personnel, taking into account, that it was monday evening and most of the tables were empty. Have been waiting for 30 min and noone came to me. DO NOT recommend at all!!! Worse place, Iâ€™ve ever visit!!
The view is beautiful. Food was great and the service was probably the best about the place.
